3: SELECT ?topic WHERE {{ ?course ex:course_name '{}'. ?lecture ex:belongs_to ?course. ?lecture ex:lecture_number '{}'. ?topic ex:taught_in ?lecture. }}
4: SELECT ?course WHERE {{ ?uname ex:name '{}'. ?course ex:belongs_to ?uname. ?course ex:course_subject ?subject. FILTER(?subject='{}'). }}
5: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE {{ ?s Vocab:course_number '{}'. ?topic Vocab:belongs_to ?s. ?topic Vocab:topic_name '{}'. ?topic Vocab:taught_in ?lec. ?lec Vocab:has_Content ?x. ?x rdf:type ?y. ?y rdfs:label '{}'. }}
8: select ?content WHERE { ?s ex:course_number {}. ?s ex:course_subject {}. ?lec ex:belongs_to ?s. ?lec ex:lecture_number {}. ?lec ex:has_Content ?content. }
9: SELECT DISTINCT ?readingstuff WHERE { ?s ex:course_name {}. ?topic ex:belongs_to ?s. ?topic ex:topic_name {}. ?topic ex:taught_in ?lec. ?lec ex:has_Content ?readingstuff. }
11: select  ?grade WHERE { ?s ex:student_name ?name. ?name ex:firstName {}. ?name ex:lastName {}. ?s ex:completed_courses ?scourses. ?scourses ex:course ?course. ?course ex:course_number {}. ?scourses ex:grade ?grade. }
12: select DISTINCT ?firstname ?lastname WHERE { ?s rdf:type vivo:Student. ?s ex:student_name ?name. ?name ex:firstName ?firstname. ?name ex:lastName ?lastname. ?s ex:completed_courses ?scourses. ?scourses ex:course ?course. ?course ex:course_subject {}. ?course ex:course_number {}. }
13: select DISTINCT ?id ?coursecode ?coursenumber ?coursename ?grade ?retook WHERE { ?s rdf:type vivo:Student. ?s ex:student_name ?name. ?name ex:firstName {}. ?name ex:lastName {}. ?s ex:student_id ?id . ?s ex:completed_courses ?scourses. ?scourses ex:course ?course. ?course ex:course_subject ?coursecode. ?course ex:course_number ?coursenumber. ?course ex:course_name ?coursename. ?scourses ex:grade ?grade. ?scourses ex:retookCourse ?retook. }
